Articles.Content:
Hi Together,

I noticed, that I dont have any stock fairing parts.

Neither in my career tech tree nor in Sandbox mode. However, I see the fairing folder in the game date "part/aero" forder.

I already have reinstalled KSP, I have verified my game data using steam and I'm now not using any mods.

Searched the web but didn't find anyone with a similar problem.

Does anyone have an idea what might cause this?

Thanks Everyone

Tioz

Information:

Steam Version

build id = 00840

2015.05.01 at 01:18:35 CEST

Branch: master

Windows 7 64 bit

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-01T16:37:22Z" title="05/01/2015 04:37  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 1, 2015</time> by Tioz01**

Believe your issue is only due to not knowing exactly what to look for.

Enter the Editor (VAB/SPH), select the "Aerodynamics" tab on the left. There you can find 3 parts:

- AE-FF1 Airstream Protective Shell (1.25 m)

- AE-FF2 Airstream Protective Shell (2.5 m)

- AE-FF3 Airstream Protective Shell (3.75 m)

Those are the base plates for fairings to develop. When placed, you can then choose how large and high each vertical section of fairings would be above the base (just need the text for [LMB] to turn green for fairings to be valid).

Oh sorry.

I didn't find them at first and checked the manufacturer in the cfg file and found "FlooyD Dynamics Reseach Labs"

So I used "Filter by Manufacturer" and chose FlooyD and it seems, that only the fluid ducts are correctly shown in this filter.

My mistake I'm sorry
